title: Scatter is not Differentiable twice Error
body_html:
I put forward this issue in the forum link. Could someone suggest/help rectify/explain what could the problem be here?

In summary, Scatter is not Differentiable twice is an error that pops up when I use .backward(). More importantly, the error occurs only when nn.parallel.DataParallel is used.

body:
I put forward this issue in the forum [link](https://discuss.pytorch.org/t/scatter-not-differentiable-twice/6354). Could someone suggest/help rectify/explain what could the problem be here?

In summary, `Scatter is not Differentiable twice` is an error that pops up when I use `.backward()`. More importantly, the error occurs only when `nn.parallel.DataParallel` is used.
